elements.name: Auftrag
elements.title: The screen only displays the following message "no video input". Think carefully about where the problem could be located.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Could the problem be with the screen's power cable?
elements.correctAnswer: No, the screen is still supplied with power.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: What are your first solutions?
elements.correctAnswer: Check the plug connection, reconnect the graphics cable, switch off the PC and monitor and switch on again.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: Unfortunately, that didn't help. It could be that something is broken. Which three devices could be damaged?
elements.correctAnswer: The graphics cable, the computer or the screen.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: How do you check whether the fault lies with the first device?
elements.correctAnswer: Replace the graphics cable and check whether the screen now has an input.
